definition: to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)
to stare blankly/to look on helplessly/to look on unfeelingly
to stare blankly/to look on helplessly/to look on unfeelingly

pinyin: zheng1 yi1 yan3 bi4 yi1 yan3

definition: to lie through one's teeth (idiom)/to talk drivel
pinyin: zheng1 zhe5 yan3 jing1 shuo1 xia1 hua4

definition: to lie through one's teeth (idiom)/to talk drivel

pinyin: zheng1 yi1 zhi1 yan3 bi4 yi1 zhi1 yan3
zheng1 zhi1 yan3 bi4 zhi1 yan3

sentences.english: The wounded soldier opened his eyes once, but lost consciousness again immediately.
sentences.chinese: 那个伤员睁了一下眼晴随即又昏了过去。

sentences.english: Jeremy's eyes widened as he looked down at the city lights.
sentences.chinese: 杰瑞米的眼睛睁得很大，眺望这个城市的灯光。

sentences.english: I am too tired and sleepy to open my eyes now.
sentences.chinese: 现在感觉又累又瞌睡，眼睛都睁不不开了。

sentences.english: The girl's eyes almost popped out of her head with excitement.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩兴奋得把眼睛睁得大大的。

sentences.english: The horse's eyes also go wide.
sentences.chinese: 重铠马的眼睛同样也圆睁着。

sentences.english: Dr. Abaddon turned from the window momentarily, his eyes wide.
sentences.chinese: 阿巴登立刻从窗口转过身来，睁大了眼睛。

sentences.english: Two small children sat in the backseat, their eyes wide with fear.
sentences.chinese: 两个小孩坐在后座上，他们的眼睛因恐惧睁得大大的。

sentences.english: Open eyes allow you to be more present.
sentences.chinese: 睁着眼睛可以让你更关注当下。

sentences.english: You must also face up to guard against the signs of the Xiehuo there.
sentences.chinese: 你一定还在睁大双眼，警惕着邪火出现的征象。

sentences.english: When they could see again, Chiang was gone.
sentences.chinese: 大家再睁眼看时，江已经不知去向了。

sentences.english: His eyes looking at the dark ceiling, not a little sleepy.
sentences.chinese: 睁着眼望着黑洞洞的天花板，没有一点睡意。

sentences.english: Look around, it is happening all around you.
sentences.chinese: 睁眼看看吧，这就是你们周围所发生的事情。
她的眼睛因兴奋而睁得滚圆。

sentences.english: A miracle will soon appear, "eyes opened wide points, sights poker."
sentences.chinese: 奇迹即将出现，“眼睛睁大点，看准扑克牌。”

sentences.english: Lift up your eyes and look at God's blessed and unfly-blown truth.
sentences.chinese: 睁大你的眼睛，看到上帝并不会保佑我们。

sentences.english: Eye Dropper is extension for Google Chrome and Chromium.
sentences.chinese: 睁大眼是为谷歌浏览器以及谷歌开源项目而造的插件。

definition: to open (one's eyes) wide/to stare at/to glare at
eyeball/fig. the apple of one's eye (i.e. favorite person)
to narrow one's eyes/to squint/(dialect) to take a nap
